SEARCH
Package JavaSprint

Class Book

java.lang.Object
JavaSprint.Book
public class Book extends Object
The Book class represents a book in the library system. It stores information about the book, including its ISBN, title, author, publisher, number of copies, status, borrowed date, and return date.

  • Field Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Field

    The ISBN (International Standard Book Number) of the book.

    numCopies
    The number of copies of the book available in the library.
    Date
    returnDate
    The date when the book is due to be returned.
    BookStatus
    status
    The status of the book (e.g., available, checked out).
